INCLUSIVE ECONOMY AND GOOD GROWTH 15.53 Given the complexity of the provision of affordable commercial space, applicants are expected to engage with the council as early in the process as possible. The councilâ€™s economic development team can support the applicant with identifying a suitable affordable workspace operator or occupier(s). 15.54 The design and fit-out of affordable commercial space are key considerations in its suitability for the end-users. Part 4 of the policy seeks to ensure that all affordable workspace is designed and fitted out to a minimum level that is usable by any end user to ensure that the final occupiers or operators are not responsible for large fit-out costs that then significantly reduce the affordability of the space. 15.55 Development proposals for affordable workspace are expected to meet the following standards:
